  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92782</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92782</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">L'année lumière</string>
            <string language="en">The light year</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das helle Jahr</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O ano claro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'anno chiaro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ελαφρύ έτος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El año ligero</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre que les étoiles les plus proches du système solaire sont à plus de quatre années lumière de distance. Une année lumière est la distance que la lumière parcourt en une année.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the nearest star to the solar system is more than four light years away.  A light year is the distance light travels in a year.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">année lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light year</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">système solaire</string>
            <string language="en">solar system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">vitesse de lumière</string>
            <string language="en">speed of light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoile</string>
            <string language="en">star</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß der nächste Stern
zum Solarsystem mehr als vier helle Jahre entfernt ist. Ein 
helles Jahr ist die Abstand Lichtspielräume in einem Jahr.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a estrela a mais 
próxima ao sistema solar tem mais de quatro anos claros ausente. 
Um ano claro é os cursos da luz da distância em um ano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che la stella più 
vicina al sistema solare è assente più di quattro anni chiari. 
Un anno chiaro è le corse della luce di distanza durante un 
anno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ότι το κοντινότερο 
αστέρι στο ηλιακό σύστημα είναι περισσότερο από τέσσερα 
ελαφριά έτη μακριά. Ένα ελαφρύ έτος είναι τα ελαφριά 
ταξίδια απόστασης σε ένα έτος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la estrella más 
cercana a la Sistema Solar es más de cuatro años ligeros de ausente.
Un año ligero es los recorridos de la luz de la distancia en un
año.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helles Jahr</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solarsystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lichtgeschwindigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ano claro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">velocidade de luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estrela</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">anno chiaro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sistema solare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">velocità di luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">stella</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαφρύ έτος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλιακό σύστημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ταχύτητα του φωτός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αστέρι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">año ligero</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sistema Solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">velocidad de la luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estrella</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
